title: Leauge Year Review Broken

embed.description: Take a look at a data-filled journey through a year of League.

body: I try to get my stats and it keeps directing me towards the general yearly review of all league of legends, I'm signed in. I have tried this many times, I have logged out and logged in many times I have restarted the link many times and still nothing. The link is broken, I have talked to friends and the link is broken for them too, so it is not just a me problem. Also, why is there not a board for problems with links, league has links everywhere so this must happen frequently enough for there to be a board about it.

replies.body:
We're aware of the issues with this page for some players. We're looking into it, so for now, the best action to take would be to report this on the [**Bug Tracker**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) so we can keep an eye on this.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Same for me. It appears the problem is caused by an API request going to https://yir.na.leagueoflegends.com/stats/v1/private and returning a status result of "503 Service Unavailable". This causes the personal status Javascript code to fail and return you to the general stats page. 

I've put in a bug report with the details... here's hoping they fix it soon.
I am super frustrated about that. I would really love to see my stats, but I cannot connect to the site properly. If I do connect however, half of the page is empty and filled with 0's and 0%.

Seems like a pretty common occurance at the moment.
Many people on FB. Omplaining about it.
